languages.text: "Однажды Великий вплел наши судьбы в сияющий гобелен этого мира золотыми и серебряными нитями, о шерин. И сегодня узор наших жизней либо будет завершен..." {n}Джай нарочито громко щелкает металлическими пальцами.{/n} "Либо гобелен разорвется. Лично я предпочитаю уповать на первый вариант".

"The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."
languages.original_text: "Однажды Великий вплел наши судьбы в сияющий гобелен этого мира золотыми и серебряными нитями, о шерин. И сегодня узор наших жизней либо будет завершен..." {n}Джай нарочито громко щелкает металлическими пальцами.{/n} "Либо гобелен разорвется. Лично я предпочитаю уповать на первый вариант".

And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

"The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

"The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンはかつて、あたしたちの運命を金と銀の糸でこの世の光り輝くタペストリーに織り込んでくださったの。そして今日、あたしたちの運命の織物は完成する…」{n}ジェイは意図的に金属の指を大きく鳴らした。{/n}「それか、織物は無残に引きちぎられる。個人的には前者であってほしいと思うのだけど」
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンはかつて、あたしたちの運命を金と銀の糸でこの世の光り輝くタペストリーに織り込んでくださったの。そして今日、あたしたちの運命の織物は完成する…」{n}ジェイは意図的に金属の指を大きく鳴らした。{/n}「それか、織物は無残に引きちぎられる。個人的には前者であってほしいと思うのだけど」

languages.text: “亲爱的，至高无上的神皇用金丝与银线，将我们的命运编织成一幅举世无双的锦绣。而今天，要么是这幅杰作的大功告成之日……”{n}婕伊故意用金属手指用力打了个响指。{/n}“要么就是它的粉身碎骨之日。当然，我个人希望是第一种。”
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，至高无上的神皇用金丝与银线，将我们的命运编织成一幅举世无双的锦绣。而今天，要么是这幅杰作的大功告成之日……”{n}婕伊故意用金属手指用力打了个响指。{/n}“要么就是它的粉身碎骨之日。当然，我个人希望是第一种。”

languages.text: "Der Erhabene wob einst mit Gold- und Silberfäden unser Schicksal in den glitzernden Wandteppich dieser Welt, Shereen. Und heute wird entweder das Muster unserer Leben vervollständigt"{n}, Jae schnippt bewusst laut mit ihren metallischen Fingern,{/n} "oder der Wandteppich wird zerrissen. Ich lege meine Hoffnung lieber in erstere Option."
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

traits.locale_text: "Der Erhabene wob einst mit Gold- und Silberfäden unser Schicksal in den glitzernden Wandteppich dieser Welt, Shereen. Und heute wird entweder das Muster unserer Leben vervollständigt"{n}, Jae schnippt bewusst laut mit ihren metallischen Fingern,{/n} "oder der Wandteppich wird zerrissen. Ich lege meine Hoffnung lieber in erstere Option."

languages.text: «El Exaltado tejió nuestros destinos en el reluciente tapiz de este mundo usando hilos de oro y plata, shereen. Y hoy, el diseño de nuestras vidas quedará completado...». {n}Jae chasquea sonoramente sus dedos de metal.{/n} «O el tapiz quedará hecho jirones. Personalmente soy partidaria de la primera opción».
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

traits.locale_text: «El Exaltado tejió nuestros destinos en el reluciente tapiz de este mundo usando hilos de oro y plata, shereen. Y hoy, el diseño de nuestras vidas quedará completado...». {n}Jae chasquea sonoramente sus dedos de metal.{/n} «O el tapiz quedará hecho jirones. Personalmente soy partidaria de la primera opción».

languages.text: « L'Exalté a entrelacé nos destinées dans la tapisserie scintillante de ce monde en les tissant avec des fils d'or et d'argent, shereen. Et aujourd'hui, soit le motif de vos vies sera achevé... soit la tapisserie sera déchirée, {n}dit Jae en faisant bruyamment claquer ses doigts métalliques.{/n} Personnellement, je préfère mettre tous mes espoirs dans la première option. »
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."

traits.locale_text: « L'Exalté a entrelacé nos destinées dans la tapisserie scintillante de ce monde en les tissant avec des fils d'or et d'argent, shereen. Et aujourd'hui, soit le motif de vos vies sera achevé... soit la tapisserie sera déchirée, {n}dit Jae en faisant bruyamment claquer ses doigts métalliques.{/n} Personnellement, je préfère mettre tous mes espoirs dans la première option. »

languages.text: "Görkemli, kaderlerimizi bu dünyanın içine altın ve gümüş ipliklerle ilmek ilmek işlemiş şirinim. Bugün yaşamlarımızın deseni ya tamamlanacak..." {n}Jae, metal parmaklarını kasıtlı olarak yüksek sesle şıklatıyor.{/n} "Ya da bu desen yırtılıp paramparça olacak. Kişisel olarak umutlarımı ilk seçeneğe bağlamayı tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One once wove our destinies into the glittering tapestry of this world with gold and silver thread, shereen. And today the pattern of our lives will either be completed..." {n}Jae snaps her metal fingers deliberately loudly.{/n} "Or the tapestry will be torn asunder. Personally, I prefer to place my hope in the first option."
